ct: Chalhoub Group - Groupwide Tender and Request to Extend Current Policies to 30 November 2025
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Nasco Team,
Hope this message finds you well.

Please note that will be initiating a 3-year groupwide tender for the Chalhoub Group property, casualty, liability and marine, as well as our financial insurance lines for all territories.

To allow for a clean and orderly execution of the tender, we kindly request an extension for all existing insurance policies managed through you until 30 November 2025 (inclusive).

We are compiling the updated insured values for all relevant locations and will share them at the earliest. We recommend processing the extensions on the basis of these updated values once received.

This year’s process will be run via SAP Ariba. You will receive separate instructions to complete your registration, as needed.

We are targeting a full tender launch on 21 September 2025, with predefined timelines set out for risk profiling and data validation, proposal submission, proposal defence, and award.

As this communication covers multiple insurance lines, please relay the necessary instruction to the relevant underwriting/broking teams, as needed. 

We count on your support to facilitate this process and are confident your value proposition will continue to stand out. 

From our side, you have our full support; however, we must adhere to internal corporate governance guidelines throughout.

Thank you in advance for your cooperation.

Thank You & Kind Regards,
Hagop

--------------------------------------------------
ID: C1YJSPS_01
From: Lama Ashraf <Lama.Ashraf@chalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC:

!

EXTERNAL EMAIL
Do not click on links or attachments unless you recognize the sender and know that the content is safe.

 

Dear Nasco Team,

Hope this message finds you well.

 

Please note that will be initiating a 3-year groupwide tender for the Chalhoub Group property, casualty, liability and marine, as well as our financial insurance lines for all territories.

 

To allow for a clean and orderly execution of the tender, we kindly request an extension for all existing insurance policies managed through you until 30 November 2025 (inclusive).

 

We are compiling the updated insured values for all relevant locations and will share them at the earliest. We recommend processing the extensions on the basis of these updated values once received.

 

This year’s process will be run via SAP Ariba. You will receive separate instructions to complete your registration, as needed.

 

We are targeting a full tender launch on 21 September 2025, with predefined timelines set out for risk profiling and data validation, proposal submission, proposal defence, and award.

 

As this communication covers multiple insurance lines, please relay the necessary instruction to the relevant underwriting/broking teams, as needed. 

 

We count on your support to facilitate this process and are confident your value proposition will continue to stand out. 

 

From our side, you have our full support; however, we must adhere to internal corporate governance guidelines throughout.

!

EXTERNAL EMAIL
Do not click on links or attachments unless you recognize the sender and know that the content is safe.

 

Dear Nasco Team,

Hope this message finds you well.

 

Please note that will be initiating a 3-year groupwide tender for the Chalhoub Group property, casualty, liability and marine, as well as our financial insurance lines for all territories.

 

To allow for a clean and orderly execution of the tender, we kindly request an extension for all existing insurance policies managed through you until 30 November 2025 (inclusive).

 

We are compiling the updated insured values for all relevant locations and will share them at the earliest. We recommend processing the extensions on the basis of these updated values once received.

 

This year’s process will be run via SAP Ariba. You will receive separate instructions to complete your registration, as needed.

 

We are targeting a full tender launch on 21 September 2025, with predefined timelines set out for risk profiling and data validation, proposal submission, proposal defence, and award.

 

As this communication covers multiple insurance lines, please relay the necessary instruction to the relevant underwriting/broking teams, as needed. 

 

We count on your support to facilitate this process and are confident your value proposition will continue to stand out. 

 

From our side, you have our full support; however, we must adhere to internal corporate governance guidelines throughout.

EXTERNAL EMAIL
Do not click on links or attachments unless you recognize the sender and know that the content is safe.

 

Dear Nasco Team,

Hope this message finds you well.

 

Please note that will be initiating a 3-year groupwide tender for the Chalhoub Group property, casualty, liability and marine, as well as our financial insurance lines for all territories.

 

To allow for a clean and orderly execution of the tender, we kindly request an extension for all existing insurance policies managed through you until 30 November 2025 (inclusive).

 

We are compiling the updated insured values for all relevant locations and will share them at the earliest. We recommend processing the extensions on the basis of these updated values once received.

 

This year’s process will be run via SAP Ariba. You will receive separate instructions to complete your registration, as needed.

 

We are targeting a full tender launch on 21 September 2025, with predefined timelines set out for risk profiling and data validation, proposal submission, proposal defence, and award.

 

As this communication covers multiple insurance lines, please relay the necessary instruction to the relevant underwriting/broking teams, as needed. 

 

We count on your support to facilitate this process and are confident your value proposition will continue to stand out. 

 

From our side, you have our full support; however, we must adhere to internal corporate governance guidelines throughout.

ascoegypt.com>; Mikel Hitti <Mikel.Hitti@nascoegypt.com>; Mayar Ehab <Mayar.Ehab@nascoegypt.com>
Subject: Chalhoub Group - Groupwide Tender and Request to Extend Current Policies to 30 November 2025

 

!

EXTERNAL EMAIL
Do not click on links or attachments unless you recognize the sender and know that the content is safe.

 

Dear Nasco Team,

Hope this message finds you well.

 

Please note that will be initiating a 3-year groupwide tender for the Chalhoub Group property, casualty, liability and marine, as well as our financial insurance lines for all territories.

 

To allow for a clean and orderly execution of the tender, we kindly request an extension for all existing insurance policies managed through you until 30 November 2025 (inclusive).

 

We are compiling the updated insured values for all relevant locations and will share them at the earliest. We recommend processing the extensions on the basis of these updated values once received.

 

This year’s process will be run via SAP Ariba. You will receive separate instructions to complete your registration, as needed.

 

We are targeting a full tender launch on 21 September 2025, with predefined timelines set out for risk profiling and data validation, proposal submission, proposal defence, and award.

 

As this communication covers multiple insurance lines, please relay the necessary instruction to the relevant underwriting/broking teams, as needed. 

 

We count on your support to facilitate this process and are confident your value proposition will continue to stand out. 

 

From our side, you have our full support; however, we must adhere to internal corporate governance guidelines throughout.

Dear Hagop,

 

Hope this email finds you well.

 

We have received the extension confirmation from GIG on the expiring program until 30th November 2025 for the UAE/Kuwait/Oman program subject to expiring terms and conditions with the below subjectivity. Although we are still discussing with GIG to waive or ease it off and will keep you posted.

 

This extension is subject to credit control matters exceeding 90 days being settled prior to the 1stOctober 2025, and full compliance with KYC requirements for the Casualty policies (this needs to be done prior to current expiry date of 23rd September).

 

We will shortly top up this email with the extension premium on all lines.

 

Regards,

 

Prashant Jha

Dear Nasco Team,

Hope this message finds you well.

 

Please note that will be initiating a 3-year groupwide tender for the Chalhoub Group property, casualty, liability and marine, as well as our financial insurance lines for all territories.

 

To allow for a clean and orderly execution of the tender, we kindly request an extension for all existing insurance policies managed through you until 30 November 2025 (inclusive).

 

We are compiling the updated insured values for all relevant locations and will share them at the earliest. We recommend processing the extensions on the basis of these updated values once received.

 

This year’s process will be run via SAP Ariba. You will receive separate instructions to complete your registration, as needed.

 

We are targeting a full tender launch on 21 September 2025, with predefined timelines set out for risk profiling and data validation, proposal submission, proposal defence, and award.

 

As this communication covers multiple insurance lines, please relay the necessary instruction to the relevant underwriting/broking teams, as needed. 

 

We count on your support to facilitate this process and are confident your value proposition will continue to stand out. 

 

From our side, you have our full support; however, we must adhere to internal corporate governance guidelines throughout.
